title.value: Hitting the High-Dimensional Notes: An ODE for SGD
title.quote: Hitting the High-Dimensional Notes: An ODE for SGD

extractions.description: The paper analyzes the dynamics of streaming stochastic gradient descent (SGD) in high-dimensional limits when applied to generalized linear models and multi-index models with general data-covariance. It demonstrates a deterministic equivalent of SGD using ordinary differential equations (ODEs), provides learning rate thresholds for stability, and convergence guarantees. Additionally, a stochastic differential equation (SDE) with a simplified diffusion coefficient is introduced to analyze general statistics of SGD iterates.

type.justification: The paper develops theoretical frameworks and analyzes them mathematically to understand the dynamics of SGD.
type.quote: We analyze the dynamics of streaming stochastic gradient descent (SGD) in the highdimensional limit...In particular, we demonstrate a deterministic equivalent of SGD...

name.justification: The main focus of the paper is on the optimization algorithms and their performance, especially SGD, in high-dimensional spaces.
name.quote: Optimization theory seeks to design efficient algorithms for finding solutions of optimization problems

name.justification: The paper focuses on streaming or online SGD, investigating its dynamics and stability in various models.
The paper applies its theoretical analysis to generalized linear models, demonstrating its methods on these types of statistical models.
name.quote: ...when applied to generalized linear models and multi-index models...

name.justification: The paper also focuses on multi-index models, providing analysis and results specifically for these models.
name.quote: ...when applied to generalized linear models and multi-index models...

name.justification: The paper focuses extensively on and provides in-depth theoretical analysis for the Streaming Stochastic Gradient Descent model.

is_contributed.justification: The paper does not contribute this model but rather analyzes its dynamics in high-dimensional settings.

is_executed.justification: The model is analyzed theoretically and there is no indication of practical execution within this specific paper.
is_executed.quote: We analyze the dynamics of streaming stochastic gradient descent (SGD) in the highdimensional limit...

is_compared.justification: The focus is on the analysis of the theoretical dynamics of the Streaming SGD model rather than numerical comparisons.
is_compared.quote: We analyze the dynamics of streaming stochastic gradient descent (SGD) in the highdimensional limit...

referenced_paper_title.justification: There is no referenced paper title provided for the Streaming SGD model in this specific paper.

name.justification: This is introduced by the authors as a simplified diffusion approximation of SGD to facilitate analysis.
name.quote: we introduce an SDE with a simplified diffusion coefficient (homogenized SGD) which allows us to analyze the dynamics of general statistics of SGD iterates

is_contributed.justification: The authors introduce this model to simplify the analysis of streaming SGD dynamics.
is_contributed.quote: we introduce an SDE with a simplified diffusion coefficient (homogenized SGD) which allows us to analyze the dynamics of general statistics of SGD iterates

is_executed.justification: The Homogenized SGD model is not practically executed; it is used as a theoretical tool for analysis.
is_executed.quote: we introduce an SDE with a simplified diffusion coefficient (homogenized SGD) which allows us to analyze the dynamics of general statistics of SGD iterates

is_compared.justification: This model is not compared numerically with other models but used to provide theoretical insights.
is_compared.quote: we introduce an SDE with a simplified diffusion coefficient (homogenized SGD) which allows us to analyze the dynamics of general statistics of SGD iterates

referenced_paper_title.justification: There is no referenced paper title provided for the homogenized SGD model in this specific paper.
